featured.text: And in 1994, Microsoft CEO (chief executive officer) Bill Gates paid $30.8 million for a handwritten notebook penned by Leonardo da Vinci.

definition.zh_def: 筆記本，一種用於書寫或記錄的書籍，通常有空白或格子的頁面。
definition.en_def: A notebook is a book of blank or ruled pages used for writing notes.
definition.example: I always carry a notebook to jot down my ideas.
